name: Slingshot Climbers
description:
Slingshot Cimbers

Single/ Two player 

A hard to master climbing experience.

 Can you control two characters at the same time?

This game was made for Extra Credits Jam #4

Theme: Connections

-------------------------------------------

TWO PLAYERS INSTRUCTIONS:

Player 1 needs a controller and Player 2 uses the keyboard.

For single player both characters are mapped on keyboard and a single controller.

---------------------------------------------
